description.english: You extinguished the fire in Julie's house
description.german: Lösche das Feuer in Julies Haus

description.italian: Spegni il fuoco nella casa di Julie
description.schinese: 将朱莉房子的火扑灭
description.japanese: ジュリエの家の火を消す

description.english: You revealed the Dragon Eye Amulet's special ability
description.german: Entdecke die besondere Fähigkeit des Drachenauges
description.french: Révélez la capacité spéciale de l’amulette à œil de dragon
description.italian: Svela l'abilità speciale dell'amuleto occhio di drago
description.koreana: 드래곤 아이 부적의 특별한 능력을 밝혀내세요
description.schinese: 展现龙眼护身符的特殊能力
description.japanese: 竜目アミュレットの特別な能力を明らかにする
description.polish: Ujawniono specjalną zdolność Amuletu Smoczego Oka

description.english: You revealed the coordinates of the Buried Kingdom
description.german: Finde die Koordinaten des versunkenen Königreichs
description.french: Découvrez les coordonnées du Royaume Enfoui
description.italian: Svela le coordinate del Regno Sepolto
description.schinese: 发现隐藏王国的坐标
description.japanese: 埋没王国の座標を明らかにする

description.english: You entered the Buried Kingdom
description.german: Betrete das versunkene Königreich
description.french: Entrez dans le Royaume Enfoui
description.italian: Entra nel Regno Sepolto
description.schinese: 进入隐藏的王国
description.japanese: 埋没王国に入る

description.english: Droi Helped you for the first time!
description.german: Droi hat dir zum ersten Mal geholfen!
description.french: Droi vous a aidé pour la première fois !
description.italian: Droi ti ha aiutata per la prima volta!
description.schinese: 多瑞第一次帮助了你！
description.russian: Дрои помог вам в первый раз!
description.japanese: ドロイは初めてキミを助けた！
description.polish: Droi pomógł Ci po raz pierwszy!

description.english: Well done! You helped Pomelo and his Dragon reconcile
description.german: Gut gemacht! Du hast Pomelo und seinen Drachen wieder zusammengeführt
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez aidé Pomelo et son dragon à se réconcilier
description.italian: Ben fatto! Hai aiutato Pomelo e il suo drago a riconciliarsi
description.koreana: 훌륭해요! 당신이 포멜로와 그의 드래곤을 화해시켰어요
description.schinese: 做得好！你帮助Pomelo和他的龙和解了
description.russian: Отлично! Вы помогли Помело и его дракону помириться
description.japanese: よくできました！ポメロと竜の仲直りを手助けしました
description.polish: Brawo! Pomelo i jego Smok znowu współpracują

description.english: You revealed a pathway through the forest
description.german: Finde einen Weg durch den Wald
description.french: Découvrez un sentier traversant la forêt
description.italian: Scopri un sentiero nella foresta
description.schinese: 显示出穿过森林的路
description.japanese: 森を抜ける道を明らかにする

description.english: You restarted the furnace
description.german: Bringe den Schmelzofen wieder zum Laufen
description.french: Rallumez la chaudière
description.italian: Riavvia la caldaia
description.schinese: 重启熔炉
description.japanese: かまどを動かす

description.english: Well done! You saved the princess' life
description.german: Gut gemacht! Du hast das Leben der Prinzessin gerettet
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez sauvé la vie de la princesse
description.italian: Ben fatto! Hai salvato la vita principessa
description.koreana: 잘 했어요! 당신이 공주의 생명을 구했습니다
description.schinese: 做得好！你救了公主的性命
description.japanese: よくできました！姫の生命を救いました

description.english: You acquired the tiara
description.german: Erlange das Diadem
description.french: Obtenez la tiare
description.italian: Prendi il diadema
description.schinese: 得到皇冠
description.japanese: ティアラを手に入れる

description.english: You freed Windy from captivity
description.german: Befreie Windy aus der Gefangenschaft
description.french: Libérez Windy de sa prison
description.italian: Libera Windy dalla prigionia
description.schinese: 将温迪从监禁中释放
description.japanese: ウィンディーを解放する

description.english: Well done! You restored order to the Buried Kingdom!
description.german: Gut gemacht! Du hast die Ordnung im versunkenen Königreich wiederhergestellt
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous venez de restaurer l’ordre dans le Royaume Enfoui !
description.italian: Ben fatto! Hai appena riportato l'ordine nel Regno Sepolto!
description.koreana: 잘 했어요! 당신은 묻혀진 왕국에 질서를 회복시켰어요!
description.schinese: 做得好！你刚刚恢复了隐藏王国的秩序！
description.russian: Отлично! Вы восстановили порядок в Затерянном королевстве!
description.japanese: よくできました！埋没王国の治安を回復しました！
description.polish: Brawo! Przywrócono porządek w Smoczym Królestwie

description.english: You entered the crystal
description.german: Betrete den Kristall
description.french: Entrez dans le cristal
description.italian: Inserisci il cristallo
description.schinese: 进入水晶王国
description.japanese: クリスタルに入る

description.english: Well done! You made it out to the seabed
description.german: Gut gemacht! Du hast es zum Meeresgrund geschafft
description.french: Bien joué ! Vous avez exploré le fond de la mer
description.italian: Ben fatto! Hai raggiunto il fondale marino
description.koreana: 잘 했어요! 당신을 그것을 해저 속으로 내보냈어요
description.schinese: 做得好！你成功到达了海底
description.japanese: よくできました！海底に到達しました

description.english: You saved the Buried Kingdom from being swallowed by the sea
description.german: Du hast das versunkene Königreich davor bewahrt, vom Meer verschluckt zu werden
description.french: Vous avez empêché la mer d’engloutir le Royaume Enfoui
description.italian: Hai impedito al mare di inghiottire il Regno Sepolto
description.koreana: 당신은 묻혀진 왕국이 바다에 잠겨버리지 않도록 구조했습니다
description.schinese: 你拯救了隐藏王国不被大海所吞噬
description.russian: Вы спасли Затерянное королевство от угрозы поглощения морем
description.japanese: 埋没王国が海に飲まれるのを回避しました

description.english: You're the best friend anyone could wish for
description.german: Du bist der beste Freund, den man sich wünschen kann
description.french: Vous êtes l’ami que tout le monde rêve d’avoir
description.italian: Tu sei il migliore amico che chiunque possa desiderare
description.schinese: 你是所有人都希望拥有的最好朋友
description.russian: Вы — самый лучший друг на свете!
description.japanese: あなたは誰もが親友になりたいと願う人です
description.polish: Jesteś wzorem najlepszego przyjaciela dla wszystkich

displayName.japanese: 最高のムードメーカー

description.english: You re-energized the central crystal
description.german: Versorge den Zentralkristall wieder mit Energie
description.french: Redonnez de l’énergie au cristal central
description.italian: Ridona energia al cristallo centrale
description.schinese: 重新获得中央水晶的能量
description.japanese: 中央クリスタルを再活性させる

description.english: You obtained the Dragon Eye artifact
description.german: Du hast das Artefakt Drachenauge erhalten
description.french: Vous avez obtenu l’artéfact Œil de dragon
description.italian: Hai ottenuto Il manufatto Occhio di drago
description.schinese: 你已获得了龙眼神器
description.japanese: 竜の眼のアーティファクトを入手しました

description.english: You became friends with Droi
description.german: Du hast dich mit dem kleinen Drachen Droi angefreundet
description.french: Vous êtes devenu l’ami de Droi le petit dragon
description.italian: Sei diventato amico del piccolo drago Droi
description.koreana: 당신은 작은 드래곤 드로이의 친구가 되었습니다
description.schinese: 你成为了小龙迪奥的朋友
description.japanese: 小さな竜のドロイと友達になりました
